   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to EDD_Viewer's documentation!
======================================

Matlab GUI to visualize Energy-Dispersive X-ray Diffraction (ED-XRD) data collected at 6BM-A at APS.

* This is a bulleted list.
* It has two items, the second
  item uses two lines

* this is a list

  * with a nested list
  * and some subitems

* and here the parent list continues



1. This is a numbered list.
2. It has two items too.


#. This is a numbered list.
#. It has two items too.

  #. nested numbered list as well
  #. nested numbered list item-2

#. continue the parent list


This is a code block::

  code-1
  code-2

  code-3


.. note::

   This is under development.
